description: Number of multi-directed animals on the square lattice.
comments: This class of animals is in bijection with a simple class of heaps of dimers. It generalizes directed animals.
references: M. Bousquet-Mélou and A. Rechnitzer, Lattice animals and heaps of dimers, Discrete Math. 258 (2002), no. 1-3, 235-274.
links: M. Bousquet-Mélou and A. Rechnitzer, Lattice animals and heaps of dimers
formula: The generating function is known in closed form. Closed, but big. It is proved to be non-D-finite.
author: _Mireille Bousquet-Mélou_, Feb 08 2001
